name: Granulated Line Posts
description:
Long, lacy trellis hangs down from the ear lobes. They each cradle two nests with little bright fine silver granules.

Earrings are made entirely out of silver.

.5" x 2"

Also available as a pendant.

name: Granulated Line Pendant
description:
Long, lacy cellular trellis hold two little cups cradling fine silver granules.  Made of blackened silver with a plain sterling chain.

Available in 16", 18", or 20" - email me for a quote if you would like a longer length

also available as posts.

name: Cellular Lace Posts - oxidized
description:
Light, lacy cellular earrings curve towards the face. Earrings are made out of blackened sterling silver.

2.5" x 1"

also available in plain satin silver.

name: Double Pebble Earrings
description:
My best-selling cellular earrings.

Lacy, cellular shapes - one satin and one blackened silver - act as mirrors and shadows of each other.

Earrings are entirely sterling silver

1" x .5"

name: Horizontal Cellular Necklace
description:

Lacy, cellular shapes - one satin and one blackened silver - act as mirrors and shadows of each other.

Necklace and chain are entirely sterling silver.

Available as 16", 18", or 20" - email me for a quote if you are interested in a longer length.

1.75" x 1"

4.25" across

also available in a plain satin silver.

description:

description:

2.5" x 2.5"

Also available as a pendant.

name: Teeny Circle Necklace - oxidized
description:
This lovely gentleman is made out of a blackened sterling silver with a bright granulated texture around the inside of the circle.

1/2" x 1/2"

Chain is available in 16", 18", or 20" - email me for a quote if you are interested in a longer chain.

also available in plain silver.

name: Teeny Circle Necklace
description:
This lovely gentleman is made out of a satin finish sterling silver with a subtle granulated texture around the inside of the circle.

1/2" x 1/2"

Chain is available in 16", 18", or 20" - email me for a quote if you are interested in a longer chain.

also available in blackened silver.

name: Simple Circle Dangles - oxidized
description:
These gentlemen have a bit more umph than their teeny friends, but are still demure enough to be worn all the time and give you a touch of class. They are made out of blackened sterling silver with a granulated texture.

1/2" X 1/2"

Hooks are sterling silver

also available in a plain satin finish

name: Simple Circle Posts - oxidized
description: These gentlemen have a bit more umph than their teeny friends, but are still demure enough to be worn all the time and give you a touch of class. They are made out of blackened sterling silver with a bright granulated texture.

name: Teeny Circle Posts - oxidized
description:
teeny lil' silver posts!  They have a blackened background that make the granulated texture pop. These lil' guys can be worn everyday.

1/4" x 1/4"

also available in a plain satin finish

name: Teeny Circle Posts
description:
Teeny little circle posts.  They have a granulated surface, which with the plain satin finish is very subtle. 

1/4" x 1/4"

also available blackened

name: Woven Square Posts
description:
Lil' silver posts that are great for everyday wear. The surface has a woven texture made out of fused pieces of silver wire. They have a blackened background that show off the lovely pattern.

1/4" x 1/4"

name: Simple Circle Dangle Posts
description:
Two simple blackened silver circles have a bright granulated accent.  The tiny granules provide a strong contrast and texture to the earrings.

1 1/2" x 1"

1 1/4" x 5/8"

also available plain or as earrings

name: Simple Oval Dangle Posts - oxidized
description:
Simple oval and circle shapes made out of a blackened sterling silver. The tiny little plain silver balls lend a big punch of texture and contrast.

2" x 3/4"

name: Simple Oval Earrings
description:

1 1/4" x 5/8"

name: Simple Circle Necklace - oxidized
description:

also available in plain satin finish and as earrings.

name: Rectangle Dangle Posts
description:
Geometric and asymmetrical, these earrings are composed of alternating elements of richly texture granulated silver and a simple oxidized silver. They are hanging from a little granulated post earring.

1" x 3/4"

Earrings and post are sterling silver

Also available on a hook or as a pendant.

name: Rectangle Earrings
description:
Geometric and asymmetrical, these earrings are composed of alternating sections of silver with a rich granulated texture and simple oxidized silver.

1" x 3/4"

Earrings also available as post or as a pendant.

name: Rectangle Necklace
description:
Geometric and asymmetrical, this pendant is very modern, but with ancient roots.  Half of the pendant has a rich granulated texture and half is a simple oxidized silver.

1" x 3/4"

Pendant and chain are sterling silver.

Chain is available 16",18", or 20" - email me for a quote if you would like a longer chain.

name: Oval Dangle Posts
description:
These asymmetrical beauties dangle from small granulated posts. Each element consists of part rich granulated texture and part simple blackened silver.

Earrings measure 1 1/2" x 3/4"

Earrings and posts are sterling silver

Also available as hooks or as a pendant.

name: Oval Earrings
description:
Based on Victorian-era jewelry, these earrings have an alternating granulated texture. The plain granules sit on a blackened silver back.

Earrings measure 1 1/4" x 3/4"

Earrings and hooks are all sterling silver.

Also available as posts and with a matching pendant.

name: Oval Necklace
description:
This oval bad boy is constructed out of sterling silver with an asymmetrical granulated texture.  Half granulated, half simple oxidized sterling silver - it is all good.

Necklace and chain are all sterling silver

Chain is available in 16", 18", or 20" - email me for a quote if you would like a longer chain.

Matching earrings also available.

name: Double Small Oval Earrings
description:
Dangle earrings inspired by Victorian-era jewelry.  Each earring is composed of two alternating elements - one half of each has a rich granulated texture and one half is a simple blackened silver.

Each earring measures 1 3/4" x 1/2"

Matching necklace is available.

name: Double Small Oval Necklace
description:
Two dangling, alternating ovals hang from a sterling chain.  Half of each oval has a rich granulated texture and half is simple blackened silver.

Available in 16",18",or 20". Please email me for a quote if you would like a longer chain.

Pendant and chain are all sterling silver

Matching earrings are also available.

name: Small Oval Earrings
description:
Earrings based on Victorian-era jewelry that have a modern, asymmetrical feel. Each earring is half granulated texture and half plain blackened silver. 

Measure 3/4" x 1/2"

Earrings and hooks are all sterling silver.

name: Small Oval Necklace
description:

Pendant measures 3/4" x 1/2"

Necklace is available in 16", 18", or 20" - email me for a price quote if you would like a longer chain

name: Double Circle Dangles
description:

Earrings measure 1 1/2" x 3/4"

Earrings and hooks are all sterling silver

description:

Earrings measure 5/8" x 5/8"

Also available in plain silver.

Earrings and hook are all sterling silver.

name: Small Circle Earrings
description:
These little beauties are designed for everyday wear. They have a subtle granulated surface that catches the light and gives them a little zazz.

Earrings measure 5/8" x 5/8"

Also available oxidized

name: Small Circle Necklace - oxidized
description:

The necklace is available in 16", 18", or 20".  Please email me if you would like a longer chain for a price quote.

Necklace is also available plain.

Pendant and chain are all sterling silver.

description:

also available in plain silver or hooks

name: Circle Earrings
description:
